open_prs.title: Add a shared PostgreSQL database
Load Scan events
Remove producer from general user creation flow and support separate flow for producers
Set up Minion and Redis Listener services for all product flavours
Authenticator setup doesn't work
Issue creating a new user: invalid_grant
User import issues that need to be reviewed
Keycloak process was killed when using realm-batch user import
Need to add oidc_options to different flavour config files
More documentation on how it works and troubleshooting
Store products for other product types (OBF, OPF and OPPF)
Ensure that pro-platform events are not added to the main product history
Stopped processing events and did not restart
Deploy for Open Pet Food Facts and test
Redis crashes when processing lots of big messages
Work out how to refresh staging from production
Hardening for production
Complete theming on all screens
Add support for Agribalyse version 3.1.1
Consider moving to a relational data model, like Postgres
